verses.name: Numbers 23:11
verses.text: And Balak said unto Balaam, What hast thou done unto me? I took thee to curse mine enemies, and, behold, thou hast blessed them altogether.

verses.name: Numbers 23:12
verses.text: And he answered and said, Must I not take heed to speak that which the Lord hath put in my mouth?

verses.name: Numbers 23:13
verses.text: And Balak said unto him, Come, I pray thee, with me unto another place, from whence thou mayest see them: thou shalt see but the utmost part of them, and shalt not see them all: and curse me them from thence.
